title: Six biggest mysteries of the divisional round
itunes:title: Six biggest mysteries of the divisional round
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling, and Marc Sessler – discuss all the latest news from around the NFL including Bengals linebacker Vontaze Burfict receiving a 3-game suspension for violating the NFL’s player-safety rules, and former Giants head coach Tom Coughlin meeting with the 49ers. Then, the heroes discuss some of the greatest mysteries surrounding the divisional round of the playoffs, and how they could affect the final 8 teams in the running for Super Bowl 50. Finally, the heroes hit the phone lines to answer a few listener questions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
